name: libsvm

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Libsvm is a simple, easy-to-use, and efficient software for SVM
classification and regression.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependent_to.name: mitofates
dependent_to.description:
MitoFates predicts mitochondrial presequence, a cleavable localization
signal located in N-terminal, and its cleaved position.

dependent_to.name: viennarna
dependent_to.description:
The ViennaRNA Package consists of a C code library and several stand-
alone programs for the prediction and comparison of RNA secondary
structures.
